## Quaternion.(constructor)

Creates a new Quaternion from the given floats

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(
    x?: number, 
    y?: number, 
    z?: number, 
    w?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | defines the first component (0 by default) |
|  y | <code>number</code> | defines the second component (0 by default) |
|  z | <code>number</code> | defines the third component (0 by default) |
|  w | <code>number</code> | defines the fourth component (1.0 by default) |
